title: Huawei’s Watch Face Store now boasts over 100,000 watch faces
summary: Huawei is the global leader in the wearables segment, and its smartwatches have now passed another milestone. Huawei confirmed that it now boasts over 100,000 watch faces on its Watch Face Store, which is part of the Huawei Health app. Those are accessible to its 17.5 million worldwide monthly acti…

title: ‘Bone Lake’ Review: According to Twisty Thriller, a Couples Retreat May Prove Hazardous to Your Health
summary: Finding your short-term house rental double-booked proved a recipe for terror in Zach Cregger’s “Barbarian.” Faced with the same issue, the protagonists in Mercedes Bryce Morgan’s “Bone Lake” run a wider range of emotions — including annoyance, camaraderie, lust and suspicion — before working their…

title: تحاليل جديدة وقرار طبي.. قناة الأهلي توضح تطورات حالة إمام عاشور
summary: كشفت قناة الأهلي موقف إمام عاشور، لاعب وسط الفريق الأول لكرة القدم، بعد إصابته بفيروس "A" والتي أبعدته عن التدريبات وغيابه عن المباريات.
